tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart

definition.text: Before you start creating custom charts you should make sure you know the basics of getting around within Superalgos.

paragraphs.text: Before we get started, this tutorial assumes that you have finished the following tutorials:

If you have not completed these tutorials and do not have a basic working knowledge of how to get around within your Workspace, this tutorial may be confusing. I would suggest that you pause and come back here once you know your way around a little.
